# removeChildBehavior(_:)

**Instance Method**

Removes a child dynamic behavior from a custom dynamic behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func removeChildBehavior(_ behavior: UIDynamicBehavior)
```

## Parameters

- **behavior**: The child dynamic behavior you want to remove.

The parent behavior ignores your use of this method if you:

- Provide a `nil` value
- Provide a behavior instance that is not a child of the parent behavior

## Discussion

This method applies only to custom subclasses of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDynamicBehavior] class. UIKit concrete dynamic behaviors (such as an instance of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollisionBehavior]) cannot have child behaviors.

## Configuring a dynamic behavior

- **action**: The block you want to execute during dynamic animation.
- **addChildBehavior(_:)**: Adds a dynamic behavior, as a child, to a custom dynamic behavior.
- **childBehaviors**: Returns the array of dynamic behaviors that are children of a custom dynamic behavior.
